Where billing meets Simplicity

Our billing software is designed to streamline your financial processes, making billing effortless and efficient, it ensures you spend less time on paper work and more time growing your business.

  • Free 7-day trial
  • Cancel at anytime
Get Started

Integrated Solution for Smarter Business Operations

Our comprehensive platform empowers businesses to efficiently manage sales purchase and billing processes, all while ensuring GST compliance.

Sales and Purchase Accounting

Optimize your financial management with seamless sales and purchase accounting.​

GST/Non-GST Bill Creation

Effortlessly create and manage both GST and Non-GST bills with precision and ease.

Stock Management

Maximize profits and streamline operations with integrated stock management and profit tracking. ​

Unlocking efficiency and growth: The Bill Sakshi Advantage

Our platform ensures compliance with GST regulation in 99.99% of transactions providing peace of mind and safeguarding against potential penalties. Coupled with comprehensive financial insights leading to 15% increase in profitability.

37.8%​

Time saved on
billing and invoices.

65.35%​

Reduction in
billing errors

What our CEO and Founder has to say…

“Bill Sakshi: Illuminate Your Finances with Ease. Our intuitive billing software simplifies your financial journey, providing clarity and control over your transactions. From invoicing to tracking, we’re your trusted companion, shedding light on every aspect of your billing needs. Experience financial freedom with Bill Sakshi today.”
